It will be called synchronously during incident raising, so keep it lightweight."}}},"title":"IChainWardResponder","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/ResponderRegistry.sol":"IChainWardResponder"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"src/ResponderRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdf04eb9cefa5f6ace8294391b0cdc6e43088e23068e6fb4aa434f64ff50f852b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b1e681db5741236cb4313a9a2b676ef9c46be1ac2bf8a0bc47831acb799df9b3","dweb:/ipfs/Qmf52pYMYfF4htAgHzprfmfaxXp2J6sUWJuWakSrbypS16"]},"src/SignalTypes.sol":{"keccak256":"0x09514dc39660b665d1c39b17f4664c58ae8580005214bb08cf1933621288f666","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1876ce007cb50cfda92821abcb663a6cfdbba84a02072863b585ff71860958cc","dweb:/ipfs/QmZrYSZUPJkEGr8sAPCHz7gAMjk4DzkWCPgdAoXWmJ9gRZ"]}},"version":1}

onIncidentRaised(uint256,uint8,uint8,str.details: Called when a new incident is raised on a monitored chain

params.chainId: The Orbit chain experiencing the incident
params.signalType: The type of failure detected (e.g., SEQUENCER_STALL)

returns.canRespond: True if this responder can take action (false = no-op)  IMPORTANT: This function should be idempotent and gas-efficient. It will be called synchronously during incident raising, so keep it lightweight.
